inclusion.criterion: Acute syncope presentation to MAU or A+E
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: admitted earlier today evaluation of syncope and ventricular arrhythmias

inclusion.criterion: 2 or more unexplained syncopes within the past 24 months including index episode
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Absence of co-existing pathology requiring admission
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: ECG abnormalities suspected of arrhythmic syncope listed in Table 1
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Sudden onset palpitations prior to syncope
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient with history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. Recently discharged after negative work-up for syncope.
